
                            
                            <p>先登陆买家账号，至于什么方式登陆应该都问题不大，“腾讯APP-个人中心-视频VIP-VIP 套餐”中的腾讯VIP 京东，然后点购买，它就提示就跳转去京东APP绑定，绑定成功千万就购买，然后去京东APP点领取应该就到买家账户了 <br> 自己实战成功，纯属分享，不行勿喷 <br> <img referrerpolicy=" " src="http://img.zuanke8.cn/forum/202501/09/210642ncrqs3ottk1cltvn.jpg" data-fancybox="article-img" data-src="http://img.zuanke8.cn/forum/202501/09/210642ncrqs3ottk1cltvn.jpg"> <br>  <br> <img referrerpolicy=" " src="http://img.zuanke8.cn/forum/202501/09/210711dwmbbfp66kbzti3s.jpg" data-fancybox="article-img" data-src="http://img.zuanke8.cn/forum/202501/09/210711dwmbbfp66kbzti3s.jpg"> <br>  <br> <img referrerpolicy=" " src="http://img.zuanke8.cn/forum/202501/09/211048dozeveiyma4oawoa.jpg" data-fancybox="article-img" data-src="http://img.zuanke8.cn/forum/202501/09/211048dozeveiyma4oawoa.jpg"> <br>  <br> </p><p class="pl">你多少钱卖掉的</p><p></p>
                            <p>
